title: HTML Tags- 1
description: Common HTML tags and their uses.

cards.q: What is the purpose of the <html> tag?
cards.a: It defines the root element of an HTML document.
It contains metadata, title, and links to stylesheets or scripts.

cards.q: What is the function of the <body> tag?
cards.a: It contains the visible content of the webpage.

cards.q: How do you create a heading in HTML?
cards.a: Use <h1> to <h6> tags, where h1 is the largest and h6 is the smallest.

cards.q:
What is the

tag used for?
cards.a: It defines a paragraph of text.

cards.q: How do you create a hyperlink in HTML?
cards.a: Use the tag with the href attribute, like link text.
It embeds an image in the document using the src attribute.

cards.q: How do you create a list in HTML?
cards.a: Use <ul> for unordered lists and <ol> for ordered lists, with <li> for each item.

cards.q: What is the <div> tag used for?
cards.a: It is a container for grouping and styling content.

cards.q: How do you add a comment in HTML?
cards.a: Use <!-- comment --> to add a comment that is not displayed in the browser.
